attributes.action: Allow the State Retirement Pension to be exempt from Income Tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently the state pension is taxed as earned income, as the contributions were paid out of taxed income this is iniquitous when compared with the tax position vis-a-vis personal pensions and purchased annuities. The former are based on contributions from untaxed income and the latter are partially exempt from tax on the basis of a return of capital.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
